sandwiches.name: Turkey Club Sandwich
sandwiches.description: A classic turkey club sandwich with layers of roasted turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo

sandwiches.name: BLT Sandwich
sandwiches.description: A delicious BLT sandwich with crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted bread

sandwiches.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
sandwiches.description: A classic grilled cheese sandwich made with melted cheese between buttery, toasted bread slices

sandwiches.name: Reuben Sandwich
sandwiches.description: A classic Reuben sandwich with corned beef, sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, and Russian dressing on rye bread

sandwiches.name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
sandwiches.description: A satisfying tuna salad sandwich made with flaked tuna, mayo, celery, and pickles on whole wheat bread
